item.text: At that time Jesus went through the grain fields on a Sabbath. His disciples were hungry, and they began to pick heads of wheat and eat them.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> when the <st data-num="5330" class="">Pharisees</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> this they <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="2400">Look</st>, <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> are <st data-num="4160" class="">doing</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> is <st data-num="3756" class="">against</st> the <st data-num="1832" class="">law</st> to <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="4521" class="">Sabbath</st>.”

He<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="3756">Haven’t</st> you <st data-num="314" class="">read</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> <st data-num="1138" class="">David</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">did</st> <st data-num="3753" class="">when</st> he <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3588 3326">companions</st> were <st data-num="3983" class="">hungry</st>—

<st data-num="4459" class="">how</st> he <st data-num="1525" class="">entered</st> the <st data-num="3624" class="">house</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2068" class="">ate</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="4286" class="">sacred</st> <st data-num="740" class="">bread</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">which</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">against</st> the <st data-num="1832" class="">law</st><n id="3" /> for <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3761" class="">or</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3588 3326" class="">companions</st> to <st data-num="5315" class="">eat</st>, <st data-num="1508">but</st> <st data-num="3441" class="">only</st> for the <st data-num="2409">priests</st>?<n id="4" />

<st data-num="2228" class="">Or</st> have you <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="314" class="">read</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> the <st data-num="2409" class="">priests</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2411" class="">temple</st> <st data-num="953" class="">desecrate</st> the <st data-num="4521" class="">Sabbath</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> yet <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="338" class="">guilty</st>?

I<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> something <st data-num="3173">greater</st> than the <st data-num="2411" class="">temple</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="5602" class="">here</st>.
If you had known what this means: ‘I want mercy and not sacrifice,’ you would not have condemned the innocent.
For the Son of Man is lord of the Sabbath.”
Then Jesus left that place and entered their synagogue.

A<n id="1" /> <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> was <st data-num="2400">there</st> who <st data-num="2192" class="">had</st> a <st data-num="3584" class="">withered</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="5495" class="">hand</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> they <st data-num="1905" class="">asked</st> <st data-num="846" class="">Jesus</st>,<n id="3" /> “Is it <st data-num="1832">lawful</st> to <st data-num="2323" class="">heal</st> on the <st data-num="4521" class="">Sabbath</st>?”<n id="4" /> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> they could <st data-num="2723" class="">accuse</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

He <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “Would not <st data-num="5101" class="">any</st> <st data-num="444">one</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, if he <st data-num="2192" class="">had</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="4263" class="">sheep</st> that <st data-num="1706" class="">fell</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> a <st data-num="999" class="">pit</st> on the <st data-num="4521" class="">Sabbath</st>, <st data-num="2902" class="">take hold</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1453" class="">lift</st> it <st data-num="1451">out</st>?

<st data-num="4214">How much more</st> <st data-num="1308" class="">valuable</st> is a <st data-num="444" class="">person</st> than a <st data-num="4263" class="">sheep</st>! <st data-num="5620" class="">So</st> it is <st data-num="1832" class="">lawful</st> to <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="2573" class="">good</st> on the <st data-num="4521" class="">Sabbath</st>.”

<st data-num="5119" class="">Then</st> he <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to the <st data-num="444" class="">man</st>, “<st data-num="1614" class="">Stretch out</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="5495" class="">hand</st>.” He <st data-num="1614" class="">stretched</st> it <st data-num="1614">out</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> it was <st data-num="600" class="">restored</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> <st data-num="5199" class="">healthy</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> the <st data-num="243" class="">other</st>.
But the Pharisees went out and plotted against him, as to how they could assassinate him.
Now when Jesus learned of this, he went away from there. Great crowds followed him, and he healed them all.

<st data-num="2532">But</st> he <st data-num="2008">sternly warned</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2443">to</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">make</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="5318" class="">known</st>.
This fulfilled what was spoken by the prophet Isaiah:

“Here is my servant whom I have chosen,

the one I love, in whom I take great delight.

I will put my Spirit on him, and he will proclaim justice to the nations.

He will not quarrel or cry out,

nor will anyone hear his voice in the streets.

He will not break a bruised reed or extinguish a smoldering wick,

until he brings justice to victory.
And in his name the Gentiles will hope.”
Then they brought to him a demon-possessed man who was blind and mute. Jesus healed him so that he could speak and see.

<st data-num="3956" class="">All</st> the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowds</st> were <st data-num="1839" class="">amazed</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “Could <st data-num="3778">this one</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="1138" class="">David</st>?”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> when the <st data-num="5330" class="">Pharisees</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> this they <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “He does <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1544">cast out</st> <st data-num="1140" class="">demons</st> <st data-num="1508">except</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> the power of <st data-num="954" class="">Beelzebul</st>,<n id="2" /> the <st data-num="758" class="">ruler</st><n id="3" /> of <st data-num="1140" class="">demons</st>!”

<st data-num="1161" class="">Now</st> when Jesus<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1492" class="">realized</st> what <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> were <st data-num="1761" class="">thinking</st>, he <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="3956">Every</st> <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> <st data-num="3307" class="">divided</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">against</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">itself</st> is <st data-num="2049" class="">destroyed</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="4172" class="">town</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st> <st data-num="3307" class="">divided</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">against</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">itself</st> will <st data-num="2476" class="">stand</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4567" class="">Satan</st> <st data-num="1544">casts out</st> <st data-num="4567" class="">Satan</st>, he is <st data-num="3307" class="">divided</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">against</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st>. <st data-num="4459" class="">How</st> <st data-num="3767" class="">then</st> will <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> <st data-num="2476" class="">stand</st>?

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1544" class="">cast out</st> <st data-num="1140" class="">demons</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="954" class="">Beelzebul</st>, <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">whom</st> do <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">sons</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1544" class="">cast</st> them<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1544" class="">out</st>? <st data-num="1223" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3778">this reason</st> <st data-num="846">they</st> will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2923" class="">judges</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1544" class="">cast out</st> <st data-num="1140" class="">demons</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="686" class="">then</st> the <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st><n id="1" /> has already <st data-num="5348" class="">overtaken</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.

<st data-num="4459" class="">How</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2228" class="">else</st> <st data-num="1410" class="">can</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">someone</st> <st data-num="1525" class="">enter</st> a <st data-num="2478" class="">strong man’s</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="726" class="">steal</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4632" class="">property</st>, <st data-num="3362" class="">unless</st> he <st data-num="4413">first</st> <st data-num="1210" class="">ties up</st> the <st data-num="2478">strong man</st>? <st data-num="5119">Then</st> he can <st data-num="1283">thoroughly plunder</st> the <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st>.<n id="3" />

Whoever <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">against</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> whoever does <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4863" class="">gather</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="4650" class="">scatters</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1223" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3778">this reason</st> I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="444" class="">people</st> will be <st data-num="863" class="">forgiven</st> for <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="988" class="">blasphemy</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> the <st data-num="988" class="">blasphemy</st> against the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> will <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="863" class="">forgiven</st>.
Whoever speaks a word against the Son of Man will be forgiven. But whoever speaks against the Holy Spirit will not be forgiven, either in this age or in the age to come.
“Make a tree good and its fruit will be good, or make a tree bad and its fruit will be bad, for a tree is known by its fruit.

<st data-num="1081" class="">Offspring</st> of <st data-num="2191" class="">vipers</st>! <st data-num="4459" class="">How</st> are you <st data-num="1410" class="">able</st> to <st data-num="2980" class="">say</st> anything <st data-num="18" class="">good</st>, since you <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="4190" class="">evil</st>? <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> the <st data-num="4750" class="">mouth</st> <st data-num="2980" class="">speaks</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> what <st data-num="4051" class="">fills</st> the <st data-num="2588" class="">heart</st>.

The <st data-num="18" class="">good</st> <st data-num="444" class="">person</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1544" class="">brings</st> <st data-num="18" class="">good things</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">out of</st> his<n id="2" /> <st data-num="18" class="">good</st> <st data-num="2344" class="">treasury</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4190" class="">evil</st> <st data-num="444" class="">person</st> <st data-num="1544" class="">brings</st> <st data-num="4190" class="">evil things</st> <st data-num="1537">out of</st> his <st data-num="4190" class="">evil</st> <st data-num="2344" class="">treasury</st>.

I<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> of <st data-num="2920" class="">judgment</st>, <st data-num="444" class="">people</st> will <st data-num="591" class="">give</st> an <st data-num="3056" class="">account</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> <st data-num="692" class="">worthless</st> <st data-num="4487">word</st> they <st data-num="2980" class="">speak</st>.
For by your words you will be justified, and by your words you will be condemned.”
Then some of the experts in the law along with some Pharisees answered him, “Teacher, we want to see a sign from you.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> he <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>,<n id="1" /> “An <st data-num="4190" class="">evil</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3428" class="">adulterous</st> <st data-num="1074" class="">generation</st> <st data-num="1934">asks for</st> a <st data-num="4592" class="">sign</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="4592" class="">sign</st> will be <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> <st data-num="1508">except</st> the <st data-num="4592" class="">sign</st> of the <st data-num="4396" class="">prophet</st> <st data-num="2495" class="">Jonah</st>.
For just as Jonah was in the belly of the huge fish for three days and three nights, so the Son of Man will be in the heart of the earth for three days and three nights.

The <st data-num="435" class="">people</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="3536" class="">Nineveh</st> will <st data-num="450" class="">stand up</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="2920" class="">judgment</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1074" class="">generation</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2632" class="">condemn</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> they <st data-num="3340" class="">repented</st> when <st data-num="2495" class="">Jonah</st> <st data-num="2782" class="">preached</st> to them<n id="2" />—<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2400" class="">now</st>,<n id="3" /> something <st data-num="4183" class="">greater</st> than <st data-num="2495" class="">Jonah</st> is <st data-num="5602" class="">here</st>!

The queen of the South will rise up at the judgment with this generation and condemn it because she came from the ends of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon—and now, something greater than Solomon is here!
“When an unclean spirit goes out of a person, it passes through waterless places looking for rest but does not find it.

<st data-num="5119" class="">Then</st> it <st data-num="3004" class="">says</st>, ‘I will <st data-num="1994" class="">return</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="3624" class="">home</st> I <st data-num="1831" class="">left.’</st><n id="1" /> When it <st data-num="2064" class="">returns</st>,<n id="2" /> it <st data-num="2147" class="">finds</st> the house<n id="3" /> <st data-num="4980" class="">empty</st>, <st data-num="4563">swept clean</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2885">put in order</st>.<n id="4" />

Then it goes and brings with it seven other spirits more evil than itself, and they go in and live there, so the last state of that person is worse than the first. It will be that way for this evil generation as well!”
While Jesus was still speaking to the crowds, his mother and brothers came and stood outside, asking to speak to him.

<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5100">Someone</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">told</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="2400" class="">Look</st>, <st data-num="4771">your</st> <st data-num="3384">mother</st> <st data-num="2532">and</st> <st data-num="4771">your</st> <st data-num="80">brothers</st> are <st data-num="2476">standing</st> <st data-num="1854">outside</st> <st data-num="2212">wanting</st><n id="3" /> to <st data-num="2980">speak</st> to <st data-num="4771">you</st>.”

To the <st data-num="846" class="">one</st> who had <st data-num="3004">said</st> this, Jesus<n id="1" /> <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="5101" class="">Who</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3384" class="">mother</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">who</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brothers</st>?”

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="1614" class="">pointing</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">toward</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> he <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “<st data-num="2400">Here</st><n id="2" /> are <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3384" class="">mother</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brothers</st>!
For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”
